item.description:
This month we will meet at the Blue Pearl - NOT Bentara. The Blue Pearl has good drinks and fondue and plenty of space for us.

http://www.thebluepea...

We will meet from 6-8pm and mingle/network/schmooze. Please feel free to bring portfolio samples for informal review, or any other "show and tell" materials you like.

We need speakers for future months, so if you have anything you would like to talk about please email me!

David
item.how_to_find_us: Please gather at the front bar.
item.why: We will gather for drinks and to mingle/network - no speaker this month.
item.name: Greater New Haven Design and Marketing February Meetup
